author: mtosi
body:
### PR description:
add chi2 plots vs pT to MTV
and enable resolution plots for the track building related collections

#### PR validation:
scram b distclean 
git cms-checkdeps -a -A
scram b -j 8
scram b runtests

runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:
it is not, but I'll make a backport in 10_6_X
title: MTV : add chi2_vs_pt, assoc_chi2_vs_pt and assoc_chi2prob_vs_pt
